short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly check if homes on Zillow are in eligible locations for USDA loans while browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instantly discover if property listings on Zillow.com qualify for USDA loans - simplifying your search for eligible homes!

• Checks if the property address is in an eligible location.
• Works for:
   • USDA Single Family Housing Guaranteed Loans
   • USDA Single Family Housing Direct Loans
   • USDA Multi-Family Housing Loans
